definitions.definition: To stop living; to become dead; to undergo death.
To (stop living and) undergo (a specified death).
To yearn intensely.
definitions.example: I'm dying for a packet of crisps.

definitions.definition: To be or become hated or utterly ignored or cut off, as if dead.
definitions.example: The day our sister eloped, she died to our mother.

definitions.definition: To become spiritually dead; to lose hope.
definitions.example: He died a little inside each time she refused to speak to him.

definitions.definition: To be mortified or shocked by a situation.
definitions.example: If anyone sees me wearing this ridiculous outfit, I'll die.

definitions.definition: To be so overcome with emotion or laughter as to be incapacitated.
definitions.example: When I found out my two favorite musicians would be recording an album together, I literally planned my own funeral arrangements and died.

definitions.definition: (of a machine) To stop working, to break down.
definitions.example: My car died in the middle of the freeway this morning.

definitions.definition: (of a computer program) To abort, to terminate (as an error condition).
To perish; to cease to exist; to become lost or extinct.
To sink; to faint; to pine; to languish, with weakness, discouragement, love, etc.
(often with "to") To become indifferent; to cease to be subject.
definitions.example: to die to pleasure or to sin

definitions.definition: To disappear gradually in another surface, as where mouldings are lost in a sloped or curved face.
To become vapid, flat, or spiritless, as liquor.
(of a stand-up comedian or a joke) To fail to evoke laughter from the audience.
definitions.example: Then there was that time I died onstage in Montreal...

definitions.definition: To colour with dye, or as if with dye.
The process of approaching death; loss of life; less precisely, death.
(with "the") Those who are currently expiring, moribund.
definitions.example: The battlefield was littered with the dead and dying.

definitions.definition: Approaching death; about to die; moribund.
definitions.example: The dying dog was put out of his misery with a single shot!

definitions.definition: Declining, terminal, or drawing to an end.
definitions.example: In the dying moments of daylight I glimpsed a sail on the horizon.

definitions.definition: Pertaining to death, or the moments before death.
definitions.example: His dying words were of his mother.
